title: How to become a famous singer without money - Quora

response.answer_text: You have to start small and begin singing in small venues for little pay. If you are good, you’ll get better venues. Then you can try to make connections with someone in the music industry. Make a recording and send it to music producers. You have to be driven and try to network with anyone who might have connections in the industry.
Talent, love of singing, lots of ambition, right place at the right time, years of practice and performing, using social media, enough time, knowing the right people and knowing your self worth.
Sometimes it is hard to find people that would sing without money involved but you could find a music producer that helps famous singers and ask them.
By spending all your money as soon as you’ve become a famous singer.
